DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate safety efficacy Peginterferon alfa-2a follow Entecavir compare Peginterferon alfa-2a monotherapy patient HBeAg positive chronic hepatitis B . - Increased HBeAg seroconversion rate - Increased HBsAg loss rate - To define best treatment condition chronic HBV hepatitis patient
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Sequential Therapy Peginterferon Alfa-2a Following Entecavir Patient With Chronic Hepatitis B .
DOC.criteria: Chronic hepatitis B patient HBeAg positive , HBsAg positive , HBV DNA > 100,000 copies/ml antiHBs negative , serum ALT exceed 2 X ULN le 10 X ULN . Patient infect concurrently HCV , HDV HIV patient history antiviral treatment Hepatitis B patient hepatic decompensation .
